Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Largely \Large"ly\, adv. In a large manner. --Dryden. --Milton. [1913 Webster]

largely adv 1: in large part; mainly or chiefly; "These accounts are largely inactive" [syn: {mostly}, {for the most part}] 2: on a large scale; "the sketch was so largely drawn that you could see it from the back row"
